title: Astrologist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Every night except Night 1, you may name 3 players and name 3 guessed players. You may specifically label one of the players as a non-visitor instead of choosing a third guessed player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You lose your defense after Night 2.
- The host may instead have you name 2 players and 2 guessed players if the rolelist makes this role difficult to win with.
- If all 3 selected players visit one of your 3 guessed players. Town is informed of a **Meteor Shower**, and you will leave town the following day.
- After a **Meteor Shower**, your selected players are dealt an Unstoppable Attack if they use their night ability. If they use a day ability, they're dealt an Unstoppable Attack the following night.
- After a **Meteor Shower**, if the only remaining players were selected players, they are dealt an Unstoppable Attack the following night.
- Selected players are not informed they were selected.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Begin a Meteor Shower and leave town.
